speaker: Avril Doyle (PPE-DE),
english: Avril Doyle (PPE-DE), rapporteur . – Mr President, I should like to ask the Commission to take the floor first. I believe it has a statement that it wishes to put on the record, to which I would like to be in a position to reply.
original: Avril Doyle (PPE-DE), rapporteur . – Mr President, I should like to ask the Commission to take the floor first. I believe it has a statement that it wishes to put on the record, to which I would like to be in a position to reply.
agenda_item: Fluorinated greenhouse gases – Emissions from air-conditioning systems in motor vehicles (debate)
